entry.dcterms:subject: cultural activities and participation
society and culture
person
survey data
cross-section
Random sampling from the Budapest Telephone Register; persons questioned were selected on the basis of a two-dimensional quota: gender and age group.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
D (after 2005-02-01: A)
